sentences.sentence: Neither have closed-door meetings or trying out rookie hurlers.
sentences.translation: 开密室会议及派菜鸟投手上场也没有扭转颓势。

sentences.sentence: Two games into the three-game series, however, the Yankees have two wins thanks to two gritty performances from a pair of rookie hurlers.
sentences.translation: 不过，三场系列赛中的前两场，洋基队都赢得胜利，这都要感谢两位菜鸟稳定的演出。
